title: Rocket Ship Freedom
description: Jack Brown is a typical California teenager who wants to work for a private space company named Far Call Aerospace. Hoping to get a job as a summer intern, he drives to the company's launch site in Mojave -- and before he knows it, he's on his way to the Moon. But the journey is only the beginning of his adventures -- for besides his crew, someone else is already on the Moon . . . .
author: S.J. Ryan
